name: HEXAD
description:
HEXAD is a single and multiplayer competitive turn-based tactical RPG with ARPG-like itemization and crafting and a MOBA-like lobby where you manage your team of Heroes. Play in multiple game modes against AI or other players!

Features


  • Multiple game modes, including Adventures, Multiplayer PvP, and the Crucible.
  • Classic tactical combat on a hex grid where elevation and positioning matter.
  • Equip your Heroes with 42 unique items and skills ranging from common rarity to artifacts.
  • Customize Hero appearance and show off your unique style by changing the colors of your equipment and cosmetic items.
  • ARPG Inspired Item Crafting can be used to increase the power of your item components.
  • Rise to the top of the Leaderboards in PvP, Crafting, Adventuring, or the Crucible.

Gameplay

HEXAD gameplay follows the classic turn based tactics model with a few twists.
  • The turn timer keeps the game moving and adds a challenge to game modes. Gain damage bonuses for keeping your turns short.
  • Status effects can stack on tiles and Heroes. Certain skills will consume multiple stacks for devastating effects.
  • Player vs Player focused with game modes that normalize item stats to put players on a level playing field. Geared PvP game modes let you show off your crafted items and your builds true power.
